sentences.en: According to a strict definition, the expenses of a self - employed person can be deducted from tax.
sentences.cn: 根据严格的定义, 个体经营者的开支可从税款中扣除.

sentences.en: Can you give a more precise definition of the word?
sentences.cn: 你能给这个词下个更确切的定义吗？

sentences.en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentences.cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

sentences.en: Human perception is highly imperfect and by definition subjective.
sentences.cn: 人的感知具有高度缺陷，而且天性主观。

sentences.en: I made a definition for this word.
It all depends on your definition of punk, doesn'tit?
sentences.cn: “这全视乎你对朋克摇滚乐的定义，不是吗？”

sentences.en: it is by definition a complex object.
sentences.cn: 它本质上是个复杂的物体。

sentences.en: Parallel lines are, by definition, lines on the same plane that never join.
sentences.cn: 按照定义说, 平行线是在同一平面上永不相交的线.

sentences.en: technologies such as high definition television
That there are problems with this kind of definition is hardly surprising, given its level of generality.
sentences.cn: 由于其笼统性，不难料想这种定义会存在问题。

sentences.en: The book attempts a definition of his role in world politics.
sentences.cn: 该书要阐明的是他在世界政局中的作用.

sentences.en: The legal definition of "know" often presumes mental control.
sentences.cn: “知晓”的法律定义通常假定存在思维控制能力。

sentences.en: The speakers criticised his new programme for lack of definition.
sentences.cn: 几位发言者批评他的新方案不够清楚明确。

sentences.en: There is no generally accepted definition of life.
sentences.cn: 关于生活的定义不一而足。

sentences.en: These games are more popular now that they are available in high definition.
sentences.cn: 这些游戏现在有了高清版，更受欢迎了。

sentences.en: They concentrated on better definition of the optical image.
sentences.cn: 他们致力于提高该光学影像的清晰度.

sentences.en: Two of the trucks were stopped because they had tents in them, and under the commanders' definition of humanitarian aid, that didn't count.
sentences.cn: 两辆卡车被拦了下来，因为里面装有帐篷，按照指挥官对人道主义援助的定义，那不能算作援助物资。

words.tran_cn: 可下定义的；可确定的；可限定的
有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
最典型的；起决定性作用的
决定性的；最后的；限定的
清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地
确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性
使明确；给...下定义；使...的轮廓分明（define的过去分词）
规定（define的ing形式）；给…下定义；表明特征

phrases.tran_cn: 定义阶段，技术设计阶段；确定技术经济条件阶段
操作型定义；实用性定义

trans.tran_en: a phrase or sentence that says exactly what a word, phrase, or idea means
